Articles.Content:
Almost every time I try to open KSP (1.1.0, Steam), it gets a little through the loading bar and stops and crashes. (I said almost because it works about 1 out of 6 times).

Player.log:https://www.dropbox.com/s/yevbvu0k7389hjz/KSP%20Player.rtf?dl=0

Computer specifications: https://www.dropbox.com/s/pfulrrbbmpikh1g/MacBook%20Air.spx?dl=0

This is an unmodded install, but the save game is from 1.0.5.

Edited April 21, 2016 by spacebrick3

Hi @spacebrick3, can you please try the Launcher.app, and clicking on the gear icon.

You will be able to set fullscreen mode, and that usually gets KSP to start.

After it has started in fullscreen it should work properly after that, even if put back in windowed mode.
It starts when I click the Lancher.app, but if I try to open it from Steam, it crashes.
Hmm, steam overlay may be killing it.

On ‎4‎/‎21‎/‎2016 at 6:26 AM, sal_vager said:

Hi @spacebrick3, can you please try the Launcher.app, and clicking on the gear icon.

You will be able to set fullscreen mode, and that usually gets KSP to start.

After it has started in fullscreen it should work properly after that, even if put back in windowed mode.

Hi!   I'm having the same issue since 5/2/16, after the 1.1.2 patch release.  Never had a problem before, but now can't even open up KSP.  Where is the Launcher.app located? I've searched every Kerbal file and can't find it.  Thank you in advance.
It should be located in the Kerbal Space Program directory, along with the GameData, saves, and other folders.
